arguments.name: String
arguments.description: Provide a quoted string as an argument. Escape double quotes with backslash (\).

arguments.name: Channel
arguments.description: Specify a channel for the given argument to operate against.

arguments.name: X-Axis End
arguments.description: X-Axis ending position in the current set unit.

arguments.name: Y-Axis End
arguments.description: Y-Axis ending position in the current set unit.

arguments.name: Z-Axis End
arguments.description: Z-Axis ending position in the current set unit.

arguments.name: X-Axis Start
arguments.description: X-Axis starting position in the current set unit.

arguments.name: Y-Axis Start
arguments.description: Y-Axis starting position in the current set unit.

arguments.name: Z-Axis Start
arguments.description: Z-Axis starting position in the current set unit.

arguments.name: Radius
arguments.description: Arc movement radius in the current set unit.

arguments.name: Feedrate
arguments.description: Movement speed specified in Units / Second

arguments.name: Value / Speed
arguments.description: Single value or speed in the current set unit.

arguments.name: Unit: Percentage
arguments.description: Set parser unit to Percentages for the rest of this line, or until changed.

arguments.name: Unit: Byte
arguments.description: Set parser unit to Bytes for the rest of this line, or until changed.

arguments.name: Unit: Inch
arguments.description: Set parser unit to Inches for the rest of this line, or until changed.

arguments.name: Unit: Metric (Millimeters)
arguments.description: Set parser unit to Millimeters for the rest of this line, or until changed.

arguments.name: Unit: Degrees
arguments.description: Set parser unit to Degrees for the rest of this line, or until changed.

capabilities.name: Multiple Command Buffers
capabilities.description: Device supports buffered programming with the given range of buffers.

capabilities.name: Conditional / Soft Stop
capabilities.description: Device supports a soft stop or sleep mode.

capabilities.name: Linear Movement
capabilities.description: Device supports some form of linear movement.

capabilities.name: Reciprocating Movement
capabilities.description: Device supports some form of reciprocating movement.

capabilities.name: Speakers / Tone Playback
capabilities.description: Device supports tone playback within the given frequency range in Hz.

capabilities.name: Rotating Movement
capabilities.description: Device supports some form of rotational movement.

capabilities.name: Vibrating
capabilities.description: Device has some form of vibrator.

capabilities.name: Battery Operated
capabilities.description: Device has batteries or other consumable power input (reactor, hydrogen cell, etc.)

capabilities.name: Wireless Networking
capabilities.description: Device supports wifi connection or other networking commands.

commands.name: Reciprocating Move
commands.description: Starts or stops a reciprocating movement, specified by speed V.

commands.name: Linear Move
commands.description: Move the given channel to the specified coordinate in a straight line.

commands.name: Clockwise Circular Move
commands.description: Move the given channel in a clockwise circle from (i,j,k) to (x,y,z) around radius R on the current selected plane.

commands.name: Counter-clockwise Circular Move
commands.description: Move the given channel in a counter-clockwise circle from (i,j,k) to (x,y,z) around radius R on the current selected plane.

commands.name: Dwell
commands.description: Hold a particular channel's movements for a given time V in MS.

commands.name: Rotational Move
commands.description: Rotate the given channel around a given axis in unit Degrees.

commands.name: Select X-Y Plane
commands.description: Set the given channel's active interpolation plane to X-Y.

commands.name: Select X-Z Plane
commands.description: Set the given channel's active interpolation plane to X-Z.

commands.name: Select Y-Z Plane
commands.description: Set the given channel's active interpolation plane to Y-Z.

commands.name: Program Unit: Inches
commands.description: Set the parser default unit for all future commands to Inches.

commands.name: Program Unit: Metric (Millimeter)
commands.description: Set the parser default unit for all future commands to Millimeters.

commands.name: Program Unit: Percentage
commands.description: Set the parser default unit for all future commands to Percentages.

commands.name: Program Unit: Byte
commands.description: Set the parser default unit for all future commands to Byte values (0-255).

commands.name: Return to Home Position
commands.description: Return all movement channels to their home position and/or reinitialize the device.

commands.name: Absolute Programming
commands.description: All future commands are specified as absolute measurements from the origin or rest position.

commands.name: Relative (Incremental) Programming
commands.description: All future commands are specified in an additive increment from the current position of that channel.

responses.name: OK
responses.description: Previous command executed OK and has finished or queued.

responses.name: Hold Until OK
responses.description: Device buffer full, wait until OK response to continue sending data.

responses.name: Out of Bounds
responses.description: Specified value was out of bounds for the given channel. Check your capstrings.

responses.name: Channel Not Found
responses.description: The specified channel does not exist for the given capability. Check your capstrings.

responses.name: Capability Not Supported
responses.description: The target device does not support this functionality. Check your capstrings.

responses.name: General Fault
responses.description: Something went wrong and that command cannot be executed.
